alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 4:54PM MDT until June 28 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Madison County in southwestern Montana... Central Gallatin County in south central Montana... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 453 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 19 miles northwest of Crescent Lake, or 27 miles south of Bozeman, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Gallatin Gateway, Big Sky and Yellowstone Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
